on reading compounds: 偲ぶ【シノブ】to recollect, to remember, to reminisce, to be nostalgic for, to imagine, to guess, to infer
偲ばれる【シノバレル】to be brought to mind, to come to mind
kun reading compounds: 偲ぶ【しのぶ】to recollect, to remember, to reminisce, to be nostalgic for, to imagine, to guess, to infer
偲ぶ会【しのぶかい】gathering to remember a dead person, memorial meeting
